definition: remember at all costs
to cut/to slice/tangent (math)
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: Make sure that fish or other seafood are wrapped and use as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 切记鱼或其他海鲜要包装好，并且尽快食用。

sentences.english: And remember, this is often the first question you'll face.
sentences.chinese: 切记，这往往是第一个摆在你面前的问题。

sentences.english: I do not want you to make detours, remember those lessons.
sentences.chinese: 我不想让你再走弯路，切记那些教训。

sentences.english: When you go to your job interview, be sure to include your complete c. v. with your application.
sentences.chinese: 当你去作工作面试时，切记讲述你完整的简历和申请。

sentences.english: Remember, people have to feel good about your brand.
sentences.chinese: 切记，让人们要对你的品牌保持好感。

sentences.english: When fertilization, be sure to keep in mind not to make fat water is aspersed on plant, lest injure blade.
sentences.chinese: 施肥时，切记勿使肥水洒在植株上，以免损伤叶片。

sentences.english: Remember, pretending to be know-it-all will bring troubles.
sentences.chinese: 切记，不懂装懂会带来麻烦的。

sentences.english: If you're lucky enough to have snow, don't shovel the walkway.
sentences.chinese: 假使你足够幸运遇到下雪的天气，切记不要清扫走道。

sentences.english: Please bear in mind that your homework assignments affect your final grade.
sentences.chinese: 请切记，你的家庭作业会影响你的学期成绩。

sentences.english: Just remember that the answers on the answer sheet are the only answers that count.
sentences.chinese: 切记答题卡上的答案是唯一算数的。

sentences.english: With the enterprising spirit of the people, remember to choose direction is more important than hard work.
sentences.chinese: 拥有实干精神的人，切记选对方向比努力拼搏更重要。

sentences.english: Be mindful of your consumption choices and remember your priorities.
sentences.chinese: 慎重对待你的消费选择，切记你的优先级。

sentences.english: Remember to limit yourself to about 30 seconds without rambling on and on.
sentences.chinese: 切记限定自己在30秒内完成表述，不要东拉西扯。

sentences.english: When you go food shopping, bear in mind that we areshavingscompany for dinner tonight.
sentences.chinese: 你去购买食物时，切记我们今晚请客人吃晚餐。

sentences.english: Peel two raw apples and cut them into small pieces taking care to remove any seeds from the bowl.
sentences.chinese: 将两个苹果削皮并切成小块，切记要倒掉碗中的果核。

sentences.english: Remember that overnight success usually takes 15 years. 15.
sentences.chinese: 切记一夜成名通常需要付出15年的不懈努力。

by no means
don't!/must not
you must not/Please don't.../be sure not to/on no account (do it)
in order to avoid/so as not to
to remember with reverence/to bear in mind/to keep in mind
best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
to take note of/to pay attention to
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
